remarks: Induction on group power (lemma with nonnegative exponent - use ~ gxsuc instead).  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxnn0suc.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxnn0suc.2 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxnn0suc $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( A P ( K + 1 ) ) = ( ( A P K ) G A ) ) $.
